title: UFYB 82: Generating Positive Emotion
itunes:title: UFYB 82: Generating Positive Emotion
description:
Listen in to uncover how you can set out to create positive emotion from scratch. Applying this concept is going to give you a more embodied experience of your emotions and strengthen the connection between your thoughts and feelings!

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/82
content:encoded:
Listen in to uncover how you can set out to create positive emotion from scratch. Applying this concept is going to give you a more embodied experience of your emotions and strengthen the connection between your thoughts and feelings!

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/82
itunes:subtitle: The difference between understanding mind management and deciding to create positive emotion on purpose.
itunes:author: Kara Loewentheil
